Articles.Content:
so it is that time...

I get older today and to celebrate I amconducting an investigation.... How many beers does it take for a 41 year old to no longer be able to so a simple moon landing. My flat mate says 3... but he is a light weight. any guesses taken, results posted tomorrow...

Alacrity
I sincerely hope you're recording this and plan to upload.

Best of luck. I hope you know what you're doing with all that alcohol

Disclaimer: Don't try this at home, unless you know your alcohol tolerance pretty well.
A 41 year old man of what nationality and weight?
